channel.title: Bleach fan game, lots of fun
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bleach fan game, lots of fun" - its similar to his game, be dedicated and you will be strong and this site came out not too long ago =D join now and you can be one of the few strongest people in the game.

item.title: Re: Bleach fan game, lots of fun
item.content:encoded: Er… it looks like the site went down… but there's some kind of new game coming to replace it called Xephyr… any news on that?

item.title: Re: Bleach fan game, lots of fun
item.content:encoded:
oops xD i meant to have the link as Click Here
and also to make an account because i hate anonymous posts >_<

item.title: Bleach fan game, lots of fun
item.content:encoded:
Click Here
Its similar to his game, be dedicated and you will be strong and this site came out not too long ago =D join now and you can be one of the few strongest people in the game. I do have to say, if you join and want to really play the game, message Jim and ill give you a friendly starter kit =) which is a lot of money to start with =D Hope I can see you guys soon
